title: Space.Ace.Remastered-TiNYiSO
description:
-=- Proudly Presents -=-

Space Ace Remastered (c) Digital Leisure Inc

Release On   : 31 August 2013          Disk Amount/Format : 1 DVD ISO
Type of Game : Action                  Media Protection   : Nothing

Release Information

Space Ace, the follow up to Don Bluth's legendary Dragon's Lair, can now
be enjoyed from the comfort of your home. This fully arcade authentic
version includes all of the original scenes you've come to enjoy, and
even an all-new global high scores list so you can show how well you
handle Ace's laser gun. Other bonuses include a full watch feature to
sit back and enjoy Don Bluth's stunning animation

In Space Ace you play the heroic Ace who must stop the evil Commander
Borf from taking over the Earth Borf plans to reduce all of humankind
to infants and take over the planet. Only two people have the courage
and strength to stop Borf and save Earth: the beautiful Kimberly and
the heroic Ace. But as they approach Borf's stronghold, Ace is hit by
the Infanto Ray, changing him into a child, and Kimberly is kidnapped
by the evil madman

The Fate Of Earth Is In Your hands

Features

720p HD Remastered Video

Original Arcade Release

Remastered Game Footage

Bonus Extras

Burn/mount, install, play

Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO

(C) E/dfs
" SIZE DOES NOT MATTER
